msbt.message: Whoa! You got somewhere else to be right now?
Of course not. I'm staying here.
What?! You're going to leave me here all by myself?
Of course not. I'm staying here.
Hold onare you trying to sneak out of your own party?
Of course not. I'm staying here.
Oh! Well, thanks for being upfront about it. Guess that's my cue to skedaddle. It was fun to get a peek behind the enigma that is today, so thanks for having me over!
Oh, well, in that case I'm outta here!I could have spent all day just chatting, but I have other super important things to do too!
Yeah, I suppose it's about that time.Although if you need someone to hang around here while you're gone and snoop through your stuff Just kidding!
Whew! Thought you were abandoning me for a second there.
Oh, . I really didn't want to be left alone here.
Haha, very funny. I'll get you back for that little prank, just you wait.
Well, it's feeling like it's about that timeI feel like I got to know you a little better today. And I hope you got to know the real ME too!
I suppose I should head back to my place now Let's do this again sometime, !
Hey, that was fun, and I think we all learned a valuable lesson. Didn't we?
